title: The Veiled Chamber
description: A sealed underground room that resets itself every midnight, erasing all evidence of previous intrusions.

title: The Veiled Chamber
description: A mirror that doesn't reflect reality, but instead a parallel world — where something is trying to break through.

title: Event: Rain of Flesh
description: Recurring anomalous weather event in a redacted zone involving biological matter raining from the sky.

title: The Screaming Airlock
description: A rusted containment door that emits tortured human screams when left open for more than 4 minutes.

title: Entity 07 – The Drained Host
description: A humanoid figure found unconscious in a cave, unable to wake but rapidly draining nearby energy sources.

title: The Rotating House
description: A house that reconfigures its interior layout in real-time while people are inside — no exit remains accessible after 10 minutes.

title: The Child with Two Shadows
description: An ordinary boy reported missing in 2002, now accompanied by a second, independent shadow..

title: Folder 9
description: A digital document that rewrites itself based on the reader’s secrets, including events that haven’t happened yet.

title: The Forest That Screams Back
description: A dense, quarantined forest that mimics the voices of anyone who enters — sometimes predicting their death.

title: Static Host
description: A television that turns on by itself and displays unknown people trapped in rooms with Foundation logos.

title: The Water That Remembers
description: A stream where every drop records emotional trauma — drinking it causes violent memory relapses.

title: Root Code: ██.███.███
description: A computer virus that infects any network, causing Foundation terminals to speak in broken Latin.

title: The Crying Recorder
description: An audio device that plays never-ending recordings of a girl crying — no source has ever been identified.

title: Sleepless God
description: A statue that induces chronic insomnia in a 20-meter radius; subjects report whispered threats.

title: Grave #27
description: An unmarked grave that shifts location every three days; all attempts to exhume it result in severe hallucinations.

title: The Tooth Clock
description: A clock that runs on extracted human teeth — each hour that passes accelerates tooth loss in nearby individuals.

title: Antimemory Chamber
description: A cell that erases itself from blueprints and physical maps every 24 hours.

title: Phone Call From Below
description: Phone Call From Below.

title: The Face in the Static
description: Radio interference revealing a contorted face blinking at irregular intervals. Frequency shifts every month.

title: Candle of the Forgotten
description: A candle that burns forever unless someone tries to extinguish it — doing so erases them from Foundation logs.

title: The Entity in Bay-13
description: An anomaly confined in Bay-13 with no physical manifestation — reacts violently to human emotion.

title: The One-Sided Book
description: A book that displays different content depending on who opens it — one side always lies.

title: Second Sun
description: A floating orb that appears only to a single observer at a time, often warning of a personal catastrophe.

title: The Twitching Room
description: A storage room whose corners visibly 'twitch' when unobserved — causes severe vertigo in long exposures.

title: Patient Z
description: A woman with no pulse, no blood, and no heartbeat, yet shows no sign of decay or death.

title: The Locked Spectrum
description: A color outside known visible range — exposure triggers seizures and visual hallucinations.

title: Dead Language Transmission
description: A recurring radio broadcast in an unknown language, often received within 100m of Foundation512 sites.

title: Hollow Photos
description: Photographs taken in a certain town depict people with no facial features — reality does not match.

title: The Ticking Lung
description: An organ suspended in fluid that emits loud ticking. Any nearby subject begins to breathe in sync.

title: Staircase To Noise
description: A downward staircase in a condemned building that increases in ambient sound the lower one goes — no known bottom.

title: The Coral Mind
description: A brain-shaped coral reef found inland, showing electrical activity and reacting to human thoughts.

title: Black Envelope
description: An envelope that appears under doors at night — once opened, the recipient forgets their name.

title: The Wrong Reflection
description: A bathroom mirror that shows a version of you five seconds before your actual movement — until it doesn't.

title: The Room That Ate Time
description: The Room That Ate Time.

title: Eyeless Watchers
description: Security cameras that record footage without lenses — the recordings show figures the naked eye cannot see.

title: The Rain Beneath
description: Inverted rain: water begins rising from the ground instead of falling. Only occurs under Foundation512 Site-██.

title: Living Equation
description: A mathematical formula that changes depending on the mental health of the observer — solving it causes blackouts.

title: Operation: Blindsight
description: An encrypted AI that predicts Foundation betrayals — but occasionally provides false warnings.

title: The Last Broadcast
description: A cassette tape that broadcasts a national emergency message from a country that doesn’t exist.

title: The Swallowed Library
description: A subdimension resembling a library where books whisper and occasionally blink.

title: Skinwalker's Tape
description: A VHS tape that, when played, causes the viewer to feel followed — some develop permanent paranoia.

title: Nail of the Saintless
description: A large, corroded nail found in ████████; makes the user believe they're being crucified, regardless of belief.

title: The Blind Corridor
description: A hallway within Site-7 where cameras and vision fail. Exploration requires touch-only navigatione.

title: Error: File Known
description: A corrupted Foundation file that writes itself into other documents until removed. Hostile to deletion attempts.

title: Project: Cindersleep
description: A sleep-inducing drug tested for use on Class-D personnel — causes irreversible dreaming states.

title: The Hanging Teeth
description: Hundreds of human teeth suspended midair in an abandoned bunker — slowly orbiting an invisible point.

title: The Mouth Inside
description: A door within Site-███ that has lips, teeth, and responds to questions — often asks for blood.

title: The Voice Beneath Floor-3
description: Audio recordings reveal a constant whisper under the third basement of Foundation Site-512-A. Origin: unknown.

title: Echoes of Protocol 9
description: A dormant backup server replays Foundation security logs — but with altered events no one remembers.

title: SCP-512-050
description: Classified object. All inquiries redirected to O5-██ (Caylen █████). Access restricted under Directive 512/Ω.
